auth.title: Credo
auth.noAccount: Do not have an account yet?
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
auth.passwordResetEmailSent: We've sent you an email with instructions to reset your password.
auth.passwordResetEmailSentDescription: We've sent a password reset link to your email address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions.
auth.passwordResetFailed: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again.
auth.invalidResetLinkDescription: The password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
auth.passwordResetSuccessDescription: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now login with your new password.

auth.uploadExcelDescription: Upload your Excel file to import users in bulk
auth.dragDropText: Click to browse or drag and drop your file here
auth.leaveEmptyToKeepCurrent: Leave empty to keep current password

validation.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
validation.identifierTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
validation.passwordWeak: Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number and special character

validation.lastNameTooShort: Last name must be at least 2 characters
validation.descriptionMinLength: Description must be at least 10 characters
validation.storeNameRequired: Store name must be at least 2 characters long
validation.storeAddressRequired: Store address must be at least 5 characters long
validation.fullNameTooShort: Full name must be at least 2 characters
validation.phoneTooShort: Phone number must be at least 10 characters
validation.hourlyRateRange: Hourly rate must be between {{min}} and {{max}}
validation.weeklyHoursRange: Weekly hours must be between {{min}} and {{max}}
validation.defaultWeeklyHoursRange: Default weekly hours must be between {{min}} and {{max}}
validation.leaveDaysRange: Leave days must be between {{min}} and {{max}}
validation.hoursPerDayRange: Hours per day must be between {{min}} and {{max}}

staff.title: Staff Management
staff.addFirstStaff: Add your first staff member to get started
staff.qrCodeDescription: Staff can scan this QR code to access their clock-in page
staff.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}?
staff.deleteWarning: Warning: This will permanently remove all staff data and clock-in history.
staff.selectStoreBeforeAdding: Please select a store before adding staff members
staff.selectStoreToManage: Please select a store to manage staff members.
staff.noStoresFound: No stores found. Please create a store first to manage staff members.
staff.noStoreSelectedError: No store selected. Please select a store first.
staff.noStoreSelectedAddError: No store selected. Please select a store first to add staff members.
staff.notFoundOrNoStore: Staff member not found or no store selected

basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.description: Enter the staff member's personal and contact information.

clockInPreview.title: Clock-in Access (Preview)
clockInPreview.description: This is a preview of what will be generated for the staff member. The actual URL will be created when you save the staff member.
clockInPreview.autoGenerateMessage: The clock-in URL and QR code will be automatically generated when you create the staff member.
clockInPreview.qrDescription1: Staff members can scan this QR code to quickly access their clock-in page.
clockInPreview.qrDescription2: The QR code can be printed or shared digitally.

workingPattern.title: Working Pattern & Rates
workingPattern.description: Configure the staff member's working hours, schedule type, and compensation rates.
workingPattern.fulltimeDescription: Full-time staff typically work a consistent schedule with standard weekly hours.
workingPattern.shiftDescription: Shift workers have flexible schedules with variable weekly hours.
workingPattern.additionalRatesDescription: These rates will be calculated automatically if left empty. You can override them with custom values.

accessPermissions.title: Access & Permissions
accessPermissions.description: Choose the appropriate role for this staff member. Each role has predefined permissions that control what the user can access and do in the system.
accessPermissions.memberDescription: Basic staff access - can view own profile and clock in
accessPermissions.managerDescription: Supervisor access - can manage staff and view reports
accessPermissions.adminDescription: Full access - can manage everything including store settings
accessPermissions.noPermissionsDefined: No permissions defined for the selected role.
accessPermissions.noteText: Permissions are automatically assigned based on the selected role. Custom permission management will be available in future updates.

permissions.manage_store: Configure store settings, operating hours, and location
permissions.manage_staff: Add, edit, and remove staff members
permissions.view_all_reports: Access all business reports and analytics
permissions.view_all_profiles: View detailed information of all staff members
permissions.clock_in: Access to clock in and out of shifts
permissions.view_reports: View reports relevant to managed teams
permissions.view_own_profile: View and edit personal profile information

leaveManagement.title: Leave Management
leaveManagement.description: Configure leave entitlements, balances, and calculation rules for the staff member.
leaveManagement.bookableLeaveDaysDescription: Total number of leave days the staff member is entitled to annually
leaveManagement.hoursPerDayDescription: Number of working hours equivalent to one leave day
leaveManagement.shiftWorkerAlert: For shift workers, leave is calculated in hours. Each leave day equals {{hours}} working hours.
leaveManagement.carryOverDaysDescription: Maximum days that can be carried over to the next year
leaveManagement.balancesDescription: Enter the current leave balances for this staff member. These will be updated as leave is taken.
leaveManagement.balanceExceedsWarning: Warning: Total leave balance exceeds annual entitlement. Please adjust the balances.

orientation.title: Rotate Your Device
orientation.message: Please rotate your device to portrait mode for the best experience

admin.title: System Admin
admin.subtitle: Platform administration portal
admin.invalidAccessKey: Invalid access key. Please try again.
admin.securityNotice: This session will expire when you close this tab

clients.title: Client Management
clients.createFirstClientDescription: Create your first client to get started with tenant management
clients.passwordDescription: Must be at least 12 characters long
clients.createClientNotice: The root user will have full access to manage this client's account
clients.confirmSuspendMessage: Are you sure you want to suspend {{name}}? All users will lose access.
clients.confirmActivateMessage: Are you sure you want to activate {{name}}? All users will regain access.
clients.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to permanently delete {{name}}? This action cannot be undone.
clients.suspendWarning: This action will immediately prevent all users from accessing the system
clients.deleteWarning: WARNING: This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All data will be lost.
clients.suspendReasonPlaceholder: Enter reason for suspending this client
clients.deleteReasonPlaceholder: Enter reason for deleting this client

validation.clientCodeFormat: Must be 2-10 uppercase letters and numbers
validation.suspendReasonRequired: Please provide a reason for suspension
validation.deleteReasonRequired: Please provide a reason for deletion
validation.confirmCodeMismatch: Client code does not match. Please type the exact code to confirm

clients.tabErrorTitle: An error occurred in the {{tab}} tab
clients.tabErrorDescription: The tab content could not be loaded properly. Please try refreshing the tab.

permissions.title: Permission Management
permissions.noPermissionsFoundSearch: No permissions found matching your search
permissions.createFirstPermissionDescription: Create your first permission to get started
permissions.searchPlaceholder: Search permissions by resource, action, or description...
permissions.createWarning: Permissions are critical security controls. Only create permissions that are necessary for your system.
permissions.deleteWarning: This action is permanent and will remove this permission from all assigned roles. Ensure no critical operations depend on this permission.
permissions.permissionCreatedMessage: The permission has been created successfully
permissions.permissionUpdatedMessage: The permission description has been updated successfully
permissions.permissionDeletedMessage: The permission has been permanently deleted
